alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 05 at 8:46AM AKST until January 06 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Along the Haines and Klondike Highways, Haines, Skagway, and near Lynn Canal. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts to 35 mph are expected through this period near Skagway, the Klondike Highway, and the Chilkat Peninsula.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway
